devdoc.details: This contract is used for recovering the signer of a given message.

constructor.details: Contract constructor Calls the EIP712 constructor to initialize domain separator.

recoverSigner(bytes32,bytes).details: Recover signer's address for a given signature

params.userSignature: The signature provided by the user

returns._0: The address recovered from the signature

typedDataHash((bytes32)).details: Returns the hash of the provided transaction request, according to EIP712

returns._0: The hash of the transaction request

devdoc.title: Verifier Contract
